text: @seanhannity I hope Trumps base doesn’t get sick, lose all their life savings, health insurance & housing as a result of slow response & incompetence in handling the Coronavirus. I’ve said this while back, Trump will bankrupt the USA! Wonder if Brad Perscale feels any responsibility
